name: sad-puppy-eyes
description: ## Project 3: Coding Requirements - Must Include authentication (JWT) - Must use MongoDB and the Mongoose ODM for the database - Must use GraphQL with a Node.js and Express.js server - Must use queries and mutations for retrieving, adding, updating, and deleting data - Must be deployed using Heroku (with data) - Must have a polished UI - Must be interactive (i.e., accept and respond to user input)

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
